title: Error in 3D demo: deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras()

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is. 
Please provide the minimal required code to re-produce the error.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Workflow for deeplabcut 3d
2. Run: `deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras(config_path3d, cbrow=9, cbcol=6, calibrate=True, alpha=0.9)`

**Expected behavior**
```
Corners not found for the image south-left-20.jpg
...
Corners not found for the image south-left-121.jpg
Corners not found for the image south-right-121.jpg
Saving intrinsic camera calibration matrices for south-left as a pickle file in \\Rxamd\d\Projects\DobleCameraPerSide_test\DeepLabCut_folders\3d_0_south_right_south_left-Can-2019-07-01-3d\camera_matrix
Mean re-projection error for south-left images: 0.073 pixels 
Saving intrinsic camera calibration matrices for south-right as a pickle file in \\Rxamd\d\Projects\DobleCameraPerSide_test\DeepLabCut_folders\3d_0_south_right_south_left-Can-2019-07-01-3d\camera_matrix
Mean re-projection error for south-right images: 0.090 pixels 
Computing stereo calibration for 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
error                                     Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-8-2766e48e8cd0> in <module>()
----> 1 deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras(config_path3d, cbrow=9, cbcol=6, calibrate=True, alpha=0.9)

C:\Users\Can\Miniconda3\envs\dlc\lib\site-packages\deeplabcut\pose_estimation_3d\camera_calibration.py in calibrate_cameras(config, cbrow, cbcol, calibrate, alpha)
    156         for pair in camera_pair:
    157             print("Computing stereo calibration for " %pair)
--> 158             retval, cameraMatrix1, distCoeffs1, cameraMatrix2, distCoeffs2, R, T, E, F = cv2.stereoCalibrate(objpoints[pair[0]],imgpoints[pair[0]],imgpoints[pair[1]],dist_pickle[pair[0]]['mtx'],dist_pickle[pair[0]]['dist'], dist_pickle[pair[1]]['mtx'], dist_pickle[pair[1]]['dist'],(h,  w),flags = cv2.CALIB_FIX_INTRINSIC)
    159 
    160             # Stereo Rectification

error: OpenCV(4.1.0) C:\projects\opencv-python\opencv\modules\calib3d\src\calibration.cpp:3352: error: (-215:Assertion failed) nimages > 0 && nimages == (int)imagePoints1.total() && (!imgPtMat2 || nimages == (int)imagePoints2.total()) in function 'cv::collectCalibrationData'
```

**Desktop (please complete the following information about your system):**
 - OS: Windows 10
 - DeepLabCut Version: 2.0.8
 - Browser: Chrome
